Objective: Validate navigating to Login panel from HomePage
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps: 1) Click Sign in dropdown / Login Button in the header
Expected Result: The Login panel should open
Actual Result: The Login panel is opened

Objective: Validate navigating to Login panel from Sign Up
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Sign in dropdown in the header and click Sign up
2) Click "Existing User? Log in"
Expected Result: The Login panel should open
Actual Result: The Login panel is opened

Objective: Validate the Email/Mobile number field for valid existing Mobile number
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Mobile number
3) Click Request OTP
Expected Result: The User should be taken to OTP page and OTP should be sent to the mobile number
Actual Result: The User is taken to OTP page and OTP is sent to the mobile number

Objective: Validate OTP page for valid OTP for Mobile number
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Mobile number
3) Click Request OTP
4) Fill the OTP field with valid numerical value we recieved in SMS
5) Click Verify
Test Data: Valid OTP we recieved in SMS
Expected Result: The User shoud be taken to HomePage and the Sign in Button should be changed to Account Button
Actual Result: The User is taken to HomePage and the Sign in Button is changed to Account Button

Objective: Validate the Email/Mobile number field for valid existing Email ID
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
Expected Result: The User should be taken to OTP page and OTP should be sent to the Email ID
Actual Result: The User is taken to OTP page and OTP is sent to the Email ID

Objective: Validate OTP page for valid OTP for Mail ID
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
4) Fill the OTP field with valid numerical value we recieved in Mail
5) Click Verify
Test Data: Valid OTP we recieved in our Mail ID
Expected Result: The User shoud be taken to HomePage and the Sign in Button should be changed to Account Button
Actual Result: The User is taken to HomePage and the Sign in Button is changed to Account Button

Objective: Validatw OTP page for wrong OTP
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
4) Fill the OTP field with wrong OTP
5) Click Verify
Expected Result: It should show the error message "OTP is incorrect" and stay in the page
Actual Result: It shows the error message "OTP is incorrect" and stays in the page

Objective: Validate the Email/Mobile number field for invalid Mobile Number in Login Page
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with invalid Mobile Number
3) Click Request OTP
Expected Result: The Email/Mobile number should show the error "Please enter valid Email ID/Mobile number"
Actual Result: The Email/Mobile number shows the error "Please enter valid Email ID/Mobile number"

Objective: Validate the Email/Mobile number field for invalid Email ID in Login Page
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with invalid Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
Test Data:
Invalid Email Number:
1) test
2) test@
3) test@mail
4) test@mail.
Expected Result: The Email/Mobile number should show the error "Please enter valid Email ID/Mobile number"
Actual Result: The Email/Mobile number shows the error "Please enter valid Email ID/Mobile number"

Objective: Validate Filling Mobile Number reveals the ISD code selection dropdown
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Start Filling the Email/Mobile number with valid Mobile Number
3) Click Request OTP
Expected Result: The ISD code selection dropdown should appear and all the Valid ISD codes should be available to select
Actual Result: The ISD code selection dropdown appears and all the Valid ISD codes is available to select

Objective: Validate empty Email/Mobile number field is not allowed
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Do not fill the Email/Mobile number field
3) Click Request OTP
Expected Result: The Email/Mobile number should show the error "Please enter valid Email ID/Mobile number"
Actual Result: The Email/Mobile number shows the error "Please enter valid Email ID/Mobile number"

Objective: Validate spaces is not allowed in Email/Mobile number field
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Start Filling the Email/Mobile number with spaces
Expected Result: The spaces should not get filled in Email/Mobile Number field
Actual Result: The spaces is not filled in Email/Mobile Number field

Objective: Validate OTP page for not accepting non numerical OTP
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Mobile number / Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
4) Start filling the OTP page with non numerical characters
Test Data: Valid Existing Mobile Number / Email ID
Expected Result: The non numerical values should not get filled in OTP field
Actual Result: The non numerical values is not filled in OTP field

Objective: Validate OTP page for not accepting spaces as OTP
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Mobile number / Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
4) Start filling the OTP page with spaces
Test Data: Valid Existing Mobile Number / Email ID
Expected Result: The spaces should not get filled in OTP field
Actual Result: The spaces should not get filled in OTP field

Objective: Validate resend otp button functionality in OTP page
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Mobile number / Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
4) Click Resend code button
Test Data: Valid Existing Mobile Number / Email ID
Expected Result: A new OTP should be generated and should be sent to Email / Mobile number
Actual Result: A new OTP is generated and is sent to Email / Mobile number

Objective: Validate change button functionality in OTP page
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Mobile number / Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
4) Click change button
Test Data: Valid Existing Mobile Number / Email ID
Expected Result: The User should be taken to Login page and the Email/ Mobile Number field should be filled with previously filled Email/Mobile number and the user should be able to change it
Actual Result: The User is taken to Login page and the Email/ Mobile Number field is filled with previously filled Email/Mobile number and the user is able to change it

Objective: Validate clicking back button after login does not log out user
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Mobile number / Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
4) Fill valid otp and click Verify
5) Click Back button
Test Data: Valid Existing Mobile Number / Email ID
Expected Result: The User should not be logged out or be taken to Login page
Actual Result: The User should not be logged out or be taken to Login page

Objective: Validate the OTP expires after 10 minutes
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Mobile number / Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
4) Fill valid otp after 10 minutes and click Verify
5) Click Back button
Test Data: Valid Existing Mobile Number / Email ID
Expected Result: The User should not be logged in and should be shown error
Actual Result: The User is logged in and is shown error

Objective: Validate entering valid existing Mobile Number in Sign Up takes user to Login Page
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Mobile number with valid existing Mobile number
3) Click Request OTP
Expected Result: It should show the error "You are registered with us. Please Sign in" and should be taken to Sign in page with provided mobile number already filled in Mobile number/Email field
Actual Result: It shows the error "You are registered with us. Please Sign in" and was taken to Sign in page with provided mobile number already filled in Mobile number/Email field

Objective: Validate entering valid non existing Mobile Number in Login page takes user to Sign up page
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid non existent Mobile number
3) Click Request OTP
Expected Result: It should show the error "You are not registered with us. Please sign up" and should be taken to Sign up page with provided mobile number already filled in Mobile number field
Actual Result: It shows the error "You are not registered with us. Please sign up" and was taken to Sign up page with provided mobile number already filled in Mobile number field

Objective: Validate entering valid non existent Email ID takes user to Sign up page
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid non existent Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
Expected Result: It should show the error "You are not registered with us. Please sign up" and should be taken to Sign up page
Actual Result: It shows the error "You are not registered with us. Please sign up" and was taken to Sign up page

Objective: Verify the Login Page and OTP page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition: 1) Open the site "https://www.flipkart.com" in any supported browser
Test Steps:
1) Click Login Button in the header
2) Fill the Email/Mobile number with valid Mobile number / Email ID
3) Click Request OTP
4) Repeat from Step-1 for other environments
Test Data: Valid Existing Mobile Number / Email ID
Expected Result: The Login page and OTP Page should work in all supported environments
Actual Result: The Login page and OTP page works in all supported environments
